column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=As I was bring my bike out of the garage I realized the rear tire had flat and there was clearly a small hissing sound where there was a puncture .
#text=I got my tools and loosened and removed the nuts holding the tire on the bike .
#text=Using a screwdriver I wedged underneath the tire removing it from the metal wheel .
#text=I removed the tire tube and cleaned off the punctured area with a dry cloth .
#text=I put tire repair glue on the hole and placed a tire patch on the glue and held it tight for several minutes until the glue dried .
#text=I filled it up to ensure the hole was not leaking any air .
#text=I put the tube back in the tire and re-attached it to the wheel tightening the bolts .
#text=Again I filled the tire with air and took my bike for a ride .
#text=I was successful repairing my flat tire .
